key_facts: Plastic production is rising and may triple by 2060.
Fossil fuel companies are shifting focus to petrochemicals.
Efforts to cap plastic production face resistance.
California is suing ExxonMobil for misleading the public on recyclability.
ExxonMobil is accused of contributing to the plastic waste crisis.
Exxon promotes 'advanced recycling' as a solution.
Critics say advanced recycling addresses only a small portion of plastic waste.
Advanced recycling is viewed by some as a PR tool.
The California case could set a legal precedent for future lawsuits.
Experts call for reducing virgin plastic production to protect the environment.
